email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Steel Coils from Shanghai to Los Angeles
email_chain.body:
Dear Alexander,

I hope this email finds you well. I am reaching out with a freight offer for 5,000 MT of steel coils from Shanghai to Los Angeles on CFR terms.

The vessel we propose is the MV OCEAN TRADER, with a DWT of 45,000 and LOA of 180m. The laycan is set for April 10-15, and the loading window is 48 hours. The initial freight quote is USD 55.00 per MT.

Please let me know if this works for you or if you need any further details.

Best regards,
Laura Martinez
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils from Shanghai to Los Angeles
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the offer. Given the volume and our long-standing relationship, I was hoping for a more competitive rate. Could you consider lowering the freight to USD 52.00 per MT?

Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best,
Alexander Wang
Global Cargo

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils from Shanghai to Los Angeles
email_chain.body:
Dear Alexander,

Thank you for your response. Considering our long-term relationship, I can offer a revised freight rate of USD 53.50 per MT. The demurrage rate is set at USD 10,000 per day.

Please note that the laycan remains April 10-15, and the loading window is still 48 hours. I trust this revised offer meets your expectations.

Best regards,
Laura Martinez
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils from Shanghai to Los Angeles
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can agree to the USD 53.50 per MT, provided the laycan is strictly adhered to. Could you confirm the stem details and any potential delays?

Best,
Alexander Wang
Global Cargo

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils from Shanghai to Los Angeles
email_chain.body:
Dear Alexander,

I confirm that the laycan will be strictly adhered to, and the stem details are as follows: loading at Shanghai on April 10, with a 48-hour loading window. There are no anticipated delays at this stage.

Please let me know if you need any further clarifications.

Best regards,
Laura Martinez
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils from Shanghai to Los Angeles
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the confirmation. We agree to the terms and will proceed with the booking. Please send over the contract for review.

Best,
Alexander Wang
Global Cargo
